title: Johnny Dollar and Crime Classics

content:encoded:
Yours Truly, Johnny Dollar opens this week’s Case Closed with his story from November 25, 1956, The Royal Street Matter.

(29:52) Our second story is The Shockingly Peaceful Passing Of Thomas Edwin Bartlett, Green Grocer. This episode of Crime Classics originally aired June 22, 1953.

Download CaseClosed748
